attributes.action: Spend all road tax revenue on improving the roads [and not just a very small proportion of it]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The governtment and councils always go on about not having enough money to improve the roads, but if they spent only half of road tax revenue on roads their would be great improvements. And also stop spending it on useless traffic lights. With all the tax we pay, drivers are entitled to decent roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
